answers.answer: If there is a concern about an abdominal aortic aneurysm, an ultrasound or CT scan can be done to put that concern to rest.I am not familiar with chromelin, so I cannot comment on its safety.  Looking at it from Google, this seems to be a cosmetic skin darkener.  You can discuss using this with your personal physician or dermatologist, who can further evaluate the lesion.Regarding the increased pulsations - a physical exam can be done to evaluate the peripheral vasculature.  If all the tests remain negative, anxiety can lead to some of the symptoms you are describing.Followup with your personal physician is essential.This answer is not intended as and does not substitute for medical advice - the information presented is for patient education only. Please see your personal physician for further evaluation of your individual case.Kevin, M.D.http://www.straightfromthedoc.com
